name: @moxie-protocol/plugin-moxie-autonomous-trading
author: Senpi
description: Have Senpi automatically buy and sell tokens for you when specific conditions are met!
capabilities: Copy Trade specific user(s)
Copy Trade a group
Buy when they buy + Sell when they sell
Buy when they buy + Sell when price achieved
Buy when they buy, but only if marketcap is within specific range
Buy when they buy, buy only if token was created within specific range
**New! Set stop loss!**
Sophisticated combinations
Notes:
You can view all your open Auto-Trade rules in the Autonomous Trades section of the dashboard
The Orders page also includes a tab for executed Auto-Trades
‚ÄúSell when they sell‚Äù will currently sell 100% of your tokens purchased in the auto-trade when they sell 50% of theirs. You‚Äôll be able to adjust these settings in a future release.
Stop loss will attempt to sell 5 times once the target is achieved. Actual sale price may vary somewhat from target on extremely volatile tokens.

starterQuestions.label: If any 2 people in #copytrade buy >$500 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it. Set stop loss to 10%.
starterQuestions.value: If any 2 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$500 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it. Set stop loss to 10%.

starterQuestions.value: If any 2 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$4000 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when any 1 of them sell 50% OR when it increases by 50%. Set stop loss to 10%. Set target to 0%.

starterQuestions.label: If any 3 people in #copytrade buy >$500 of a token within 15 minutes of each other, and it is <$1M marketcap, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when any 2 of them sell 50% OR when it increases by 50%. Set stop loss to 10%.
